pythainlp.tools¶

The pythainlp.tools is tool for pythainlp.

Modules¶

pythainlp.tools.get_full_data_path(path)[source]¶

Get filename/path of a dataset, return full path of that filename/path

pythainlp.tools.get_pythainlp_data_path()[source]¶

Return full path where PyThaiNLP keeps its (downloaded) data

pythainlp.tools.get_pythainlp_path()[source]¶

Return full path of PyThaiNLP code
